txt.en: 'Hail, [placeholder]! You assisted in defeating Núrzum, but the enemy has not given up. They still roam our lands and lurk in the shadows.\n\n'Balcharan and his minions have been terrorizing the people of Writhendowns and must be dealt with. Go there, and show them that Wildermore will endure!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Núrzum has been defeated, but the enemy persists throughout much of Wildermore. Balcharan and his minions have been terrorizing the people of Writhendowns and must be dealt with.
